title: Customizable Search Interface
description: Customize the Search Interface, e.g. select the metadata elements to be indexed and shown, specify the facets, and determine the representation of search results.

title: Use Multiple Metadata Schemas
description: Import multiple metadata schemas (XSD) relevant to your user community and map them to system types. For each schema a custom form will be generated by BEXIS2.

title: Notification Framework
description: BEXIS2 comes with a notification framework to send out custom messages (e.g. via email) to users on specific actions.

title: System Feature Permission
description: Specify fine grained permissions on system features and tools for individual users or groups.

title: Extensible Architecture
description: BEXIS2 follows a modular design and can be integrated with external applications and services or extended with custom modules

title: Party Package
description: Manage information about organizations, institutes, projects, people, (or any custom type) and their relationships in one place and re-use this information throughout the system.
